channel.title: Cybersecurity on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on c13u's Blog

item.title: Signal Is Finally Bringing Its Secure Messaging To the Masses [Andy Greenberg]
item.description: Signal Is Finally Bringing Its Secure Messaging To the Masses. Andy Greenberg. https://www.wired.com/story/signal-encrypted-messaging-features-mainstream/. https://it.slashdot.org/story/20/02/14/2216214/signal-is-finally-bringing-its-secure-messaging-to-the-masses#comments. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22326731. Feb 14, 2020. Attracting the Masses Brian Acton (WhatsApp cofounder) injected $50m into the Signal Foundation, allowing them to grow from 3 to 50 full-timers. You'd think that at Signal's dominance, getting $$$ shouldn't be a problem. But VCs expect a multiple return and Signal doesn't look like it will monetize soon. Signal has added support for iPad, ephemeral images and video, downloadable customizable “stickers,” and emoji reactions.

item.title: Against 'Smart' Clipboard Adjustments
item.description: Don't touch my clipboard [Alex Ellis] Complaint: Alex selected & copied an em dash ( - ) character from https://www.thepunctuationguide.com/em-dash.html, but here's what the site put into the clipboard []: — From https://www.thepunctuationguide.com/em-dash.html © 2020 thepunctuationguide.com There's a tradeoff between attribution and changing things outside a site's scope []. Apple's iBooks does this too. It may be due to contractual agreements with publishers. [] As a Security Vulnerability (Pastejacking) [] Appending extra information can be used as an attack vector.
